name: Scope Out Soft Spots
description: After your characters use a Skill: For each stack of this effect, there is a 10% chance of creating Strike Where It Hurts. If Strike Where It Hurts is created, the number of stacks of this effect is halved. (Rounded down)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill:</color> For each stack of this effect, there is a 10% chance of creating <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111133]</color>. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C111133]</color> is created, the number of stacks of this effect is halved. (Rounded down)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use a Skill:</color> For each stack of this effect, there is a 10% chance of creating <color=#FFFFFFFF>Strike Where It Hurts</color>. If <color=#FFFFFFFF>Strike Where It Hurts</color> is created, the number of stacks of this effect is halved. (Rounded down)
